rune_desc.8112: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.
rune_desc.8124: Add an active effect to your boots that grants a large boost of <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and causes your next attack or ability to deal bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
rune_desc.8128: Damaging a low health champion inflicts <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and harvests a soul from the victim.
rune_desc.9923: Gain a large amount of Attack Speed for the first 3 attacks made against enemy champions.
rune_desc.8126: Deal bonus true damage to enemy champions with <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairAct'>impaired movement or actions</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
rune_desc.8139: Heal when you damage an enemy champion.
rune_desc.8143: Gain a burst of Lethality and Magic Penetration after using a dash, leap, blink, teleport, or when leaving stealth.
rune_desc.8136: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>Takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> on enemy Wards cause friendly Zombie Wards to sprout from their corpses. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each Zombie Ward spawned plus bonus upon completion.
rune_desc.8120: When your wards expire, they leave behind a Ghost Poro. The Ghost Poro grants vision until discovered. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each Ghost Poro and when your Ghost Poro spots an enemy champion, plus bonus upon completion.
rune_desc.8138: Collect eyeballs for champion <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each eyeball plus bonus upon collection completion.
rune_desc.8106: Unique takedowns grant permanent cooldown reduction on your Ultimate.
rune_desc.8351: Immobilizing an enemy champion will cause 3 glacial rays that slow nearby enemies and reducing their damage to your allies. 25s cooldown.
rune_desc.8360: Swap Summoner Spells while out of combat. Swapping to unique Summoner Spells will increase the rate at which you can make future swaps.
rune_desc.8369: When you initiate champion combat, deal 10% extra damage for 3 seconds and gain gold based on damage dealt.
rune_desc.8306:
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel, then blink to a new location.
rune_desc.8304: You get free boots at 12 min but you cannot buy boots before then. Each <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>takedown</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> you get makes your boots come 45s sooner.
rune_desc.8313:
Gain a free Commencing Stopwatch. After 14 minutes, it can be used for a one time Stasis effect.

Each takedown you get shortens this timer by 120 seconds.
rune_desc.8321: You can enter debt to buy items.
rune_desc.8316: Start the game with 3 Minion Dematerializers. Killing minions with the item gives permanent bonus damage vs. that minion type.
rune_desc.8345: Gain a free Biscuit every 2 min, until 6 min. Consuming or selling a Biscuit permanently increases your max mana and restores health and mana.
rune_desc.8410: Bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> towards nearby enemy champions that are <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov'>movement impaired</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>, increased for enemy champions that you impair.
rune_desc.8352: Potions and biscuits grant some restoration immediately. Gain <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>  while under their effects.
rune_desc.8005: Hitting an enemy champion 3 consecutive times makes them vulnerable, dealing bonus damage and causing them to take more damage from all sources for 6s.
rune_desc.8008: Gain attack speed when attacking an enemy champion, stacking up to 6 times. At max stacks, gain Attack Range and remove your Attack Speed limit.
rune_desc.8021: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
rune_desc.8010: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
rune_desc.9101: Excess healing on you becomes a shield.
rune_desc.9111: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>Takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> restore 12% of your missing health and grant an additional 20 gold.
rune_desc.8009: Increase your mana or energy regeneration when damaging an enemy champion. Takedowns restore mana or energy.
rune_desc.9103: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Lifesteal. Weaker earlier but stronger later game than other Legend Runes.
rune_desc.8014: Deal more damage to low health enemy champions.
rune_desc.8017: Deal more damage to champions with more max health than you.
rune_desc.8299: Deal more damage to champions while you are low on health.
rune_desc.8437: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.
rune_desc.8439: After <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Immobilize'>immobilizing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> an enemy champion gain defenses and later deal a burst of magic damage around you.
rune_desc.8465: Guard allies you cast spells on and those that are very nearby. If you or a guarded ally would take damage based on level, you're both granted a shield.
rune_desc.8446: Charge up a powerful attack against a tower while near it.
rune_desc.8463: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov'>Impairing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> the movement of an enemy champion marks them. Your allies heal when attacking champions you've marked.
rune_desc.8401: Whenever you gain a shield, your next basic attack against a champion deals bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> damage.
rune_desc.8429: After 12 min gain +9 Armor and +9 Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 5%.
rune_desc.8444: After taking damage from an enemy champion heal back some missing health over time.
rune_desc.8473:
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal 30-60 less damage.


Duration: 1.5s
Cooldown: 45s
rune_desc.8451: Gain permanent max health when minions or monsters die near you.
rune_desc.8453:
Gain 5% Heal and Shield Power.

Heals and shields you cast or receive are 10% stronger on targets below 40% health.
rune_desc.8242: Gain a small amount of tenacity that increases with missing health.
rune_desc.8214: Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemies or shielding allies.
rune_desc.8229: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a damaging comet at their location.
rune_desc.8230: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities grants a burst of MS.
rune_desc.8224: Gain a magic damage shield when taken to low health by magic damage.
rune_desc.8226:
Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.

After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.
rune_desc.8275: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain a short <speed>Move Speed</speed> increase that allows you to pass through units.
rune_desc.8210:
Gain bonuses upon reaching the following levels:
Level 5: +5 Ability Haste
Level 8: +5 Ability Haste
Level 11: On Champion takedown, reduce the remaining cooldown of basic abilities by 20%.
rune_desc.8234: All <speed>Move Speed</speed> bonuses are 7% more effective on you and gain <speed>1% Move Speed</speed>.
rune_desc.8233: While above 70% health, gain extra <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
rune_desc.8237: Your first damaging ability hit every 10s burns champions.
rune_desc.8232: Gain <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and AP or AD, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> in the river.
rune_desc.8236: Gain increasing amounts of AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> over the course of the game.
